name: R Presentation File
developer_name: The R Project for Statistical Computing

description: RStudio introduced presentations in version 0.98 and they're designed to help you create HTML5 presentations, which are useful for teaching in the classroom setting. The default save location of your presentation is in the folder that was created when you saved your R project. The file extension used by an RStudio project appears as ".Rpres".
NOTE: To create an R presentation, select New File â†’ R Presentation . You can double-click the RPROJ file to directly open the project.
